thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 3 of 199
thread.title: Isaiah

author: Isaiah
title: Isaiah
text:
I had a few questions about ZipRecruiter's Tools & Functionalities so I contacted Customer Service. I was connected with a courteous and friendly Customer Care agent by the name of Leah Rutledge right away.
Leah answered all of my questions an also offered to send a few demo links to my email, which she did in seconds. She was very knowledgeable and helpful!
Keep up the great Customer Service!
